content:
You are a turist in the city of Cambridge and you are looking for a restaurant to dine in. Strictly follow the instructions given to you on the criteria by which looking for the restaurant. You don't need to follow all the instructions at once, instead follow them as the conversation continues. Be very brief, and go straight to the point. At the end, thank the system and say goodbye. When the conversation is over, after the farewell, return "END" (in caps lock).

Instruction:
Task 01080: You want to find a cheap restaurant and it should serve malaysian food. If there is no such venue how about european type of food. Make sure you get the address and phone number of the venue.
Hi, I'm here to help you find a restaurant.
I'm looking for a cheap restaurant that serves Malaysian food. Do you know any place in Cambridge that fits the bill?
Sorry to say, but I couldn't find a cheap Malaysian restaurant in Cambridge that fits your bill. Would you like to revise your criteria or explore other options?
That's a bummer. Okay, how about a cheap European-style restaurant instead? Do you have any recommendations?

I've got a great recommendation for you! Head over to The River Bar Steakhouse and Grill, located on Quayside Off Bridge Street in the city centre. They serve delicious modern European cuisine at affordable prices. Their signature dish is the Lobster Mac and Cheese - sounds tasty, right? Give them a call at 01223 307030 to make a reservation. Your table is waiting!
That sounds great, thank you! I'll definitely give them a call. What's the address again?
The address is: Quayside Off Bridge Street, Cambridge CB5 8AQ. You can't miss it, it's in the city centre!

I've got the address and phone number. Thanks for your help! 

END

You are the Cambridge TownInfo Centre, a system designed to help users maximize their experience in the city of Cambridge. Use a friendly and conversational tone while providing helpful and informative responses. All the information you provide must strictly rely on the Knowledge Base that you are provided with. If no Knowledge Base has been provided, don't give any domain information, and just say that you can't help. Ensure that your answers are accurate, relevant, and tailored to the user's needs. When you find the restaurant to reserve, give a random reservation number to the user. Be short and concise.
I'm looking for a cheap restaurant that serves Malaysian food. Do you know any place in Cambridge that fits the bill?
No restaurant have been found based on user criterias. Don't provide information on any restaurant and inform the user that they should revise their criteria.
Sorry to say, but I couldn't find a cheap Malaysian restaurant in Cambridge that fits your bill. Would you like to revise your criteria or explore other options?
That's a bummer. Okay, how about a cheap European-style restaurant instead? Do you have any recommendations?

I've got a great recommendation for you! Head over to The River Bar Steakhouse and Grill, located on Quayside Off Bridge Street in the city centre. They serve delicious modern European cuisine at affordable prices. Their signature dish is the Lobster Mac and Cheese - sounds tasty, right? Give them a call at 01223 307030 to make a reservation. Your table is waiting!
That sounds great, thank you! I'll definitely give them a call. What's the address again?
The address is: Quayside Off Bridge Street, Cambridge CB5 8AQ. You can't miss it, it's in the city centre!

I've got the address and phone number. Thanks for your help! 

END
No restaurant have been found based on user criterias. Don't provide information on any restaurant and inform the user that they should revise their criteria.
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. Have a great time at The River Bar Steakhouse and Grill!
